entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
